Commands.HelpText: Just try the command and see what happens.
Use "!rps" to join randomly. Use "!rps rock" to select rock. Bot will eventually choose randomly and award the winners.
No help text yet.
But it's so intuitive... Sorry, help is coming soon...
Use "!hangman" to start a game. Use "!hangman x" to guess a letter. Use "!hangman word" to guess a word.
Use !alias add <existing> <new> to add a new command name, or !alias del <existing> to delete a command name. For example, "!alias add hangman hm" creates a new shorthand for Hangman.
Use "!blast [choice]". Replace [choice] with one of: {0}
Use the bonus command to give free coins to someone example: !bonus sadukie 50
Use "!coins" to see your current coin total, or use "!coins SomeoneElse" to see another user's coin total.
Use this command to see available commands. Mods can use it to make new commands, using "!Commands add hello "Hello world!" Everyone"
Give coins to someone. Example !give LNGgrinds 10
I think you figured this out already...

"Use !Quote to get a random quote, use !Quote [number] to get a specific quote, or a moderator may use !Quote add "Quote here." <author> to add a quote. For example, "!Quote add "Oh what a day!" Brendoneus" creates a new quote."
To see our schedule just type !schedule followed by either a timezone offset of a city name. Example !schedule -4 or !schedule Cleveland
Use "!ShoutOut @DevChatter" or "!ShoutOut DevChatter"
Use "!Streams" to shout out the streams we like! To add a new one use "!Streams add channelName", but it only works for mods.
Take coins from someone. Example !tax AridTag 10
List the biggest ballers in the chat!
Just type "!uptime" and it will tell you how long we've been streaming.
Shows the current viewer count.
This needs helps text.
Use "!duel Brendoneus" to start a duel with Brendoneus. Once it begins you will each be whispered instructions.
